description: This file defines an ApiService class that encapsulates HTTP request logic using axios, including setup of interceptors for authentication and error handling. It provides methods for GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, and file upload operations, and manages authentication tokens via localStorage.

classes.name: ApiService
classes.description: A class providing methods for API communication with built-in handling for authentication tokens, error processing, and request interception.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the ApiService, sets the baseURL, configures the axios client, and sets up interceptors.

methods.name: setupInterceptors
methods.description: Configures interceptors for request and response to handle tokens and errors.

methods.name: handleError
methods.description: Processes errors from axios requests, differentiating between response errors, network errors, and other types.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the specified URL and returns a standardized ApiResponse.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs a POST request with provided data.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Performs a PUT request with provided data.

methods.name: patch
methods.description: Performs a PATCH request with provided data.

methods.name: upload
methods.description: Uploads a file with progress reporting.

methods.name: setAuthToken
methods.description: Stores the auth token in localStorage.

methods.name: removeAuthToken
methods.description: Removes auth and refresh tokens from localStorage.

methods.name: getAuthToken
methods.description: Retrieves the auth token from localStorage.
